remarks: Inference from Theorem 19.21 of [Margaris] p. 90.  (Restricted quantifier version with double quantification.)  (Contributed by NM, 2-Feb-2008.)
statement:
ralrimdvva.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( ps -> ch ) ) $.
ralrimdvva $p |- ( ph -> ( ps -> A. x e. A A. y e. B ch ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d ph x y $.
$d ps x y $.
